COPY.LABEL: Copy
COPY.DATA: Create a new workspace with the data

MESSAGE.CREATE_NOK: An error has occurred. The workspace was not created.
MESSAGE.MENU_ALREADY_EXIST: A Menu Item with that name/id already exists
MESSAGE.MENU_CREATE_OK: The Menu Item was created successfully
MESSAGE.MENU_CREATE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Menu Item was not created.

DELETE.LABEL: Delete
DELETE.MENU_DELETE_OK: The Menu Item was deleted successfully
DELETE.MENU_DELETE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Menu Item could not be deleted.

MESSAGE.CHANGE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Workspace was not changed.
MESSAGE.MENU_CHANGE_OK: The Menu Item was changed successfully
MESSAGE.MENU_CHANGE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Menu Item was not changed.

EXPORT.LABEL: Export
EXPORT.WORKSPACE: Download the current Workspace definition in JSON format.
EXPORT.THEME_INCLUDE: Include the Theme definition in the export

IMPORT.LABEL: Import
IMPORT.WORKSPACE: Import Workspace definition in JSON format.

TOOLTIPS.ROLES: Roles valid for use the Workspace (an excerpt of tenant roles)
TOOLTIPS.PRODUCTS: Products registered for this Workspace - usable in menu items etc.

TOOLTIPS.CREATION_USER: Name of the user of the creation
TOOLTIPS.MODIFICATION_USER: Name of the user of the last change

ROLE.NAME: Name
ROLE.DELETE_ROLE_MESSAGE: If you remove the role, it will be also removed from any menu item where it is used. Are you sure that you want to proceed?
ROLE.NEW_ROLE_DUPLICATED: Role already exists in this Workspace
ROLE.NEW_ROLE_ERROR: New role should has minimum one character and cannot contains ',' symbol or only white spaces

TOOLTIP.BADGE: Icon from the PrimeNG library which should be displayed next to the menu name
TOOLTIP.DISABLED: If set, the menu item is displayed inactive
TOOLTIP.EXTERN: If set, the menu item exits the Workspace context
TOOLTIP.MENU_ID: A unique identifier of the menu item
TOOLTIP.PARENT_ID: The identifier of the parent menu item
TOOLTIP.PARENT_NAME: The name of the parent menu item
TOOLTIP.POSITION: An integer number that determines the position of the menu item in the menu structure
TOOLTIP.URL: The URL accessed by the menu item. Can be internal (via registered Product ) or external (leaving the Workspace).

HEADER.DETAIL: Display and editing of the Workspace properties

QUICK_LINKS.GOTO_WORKSPACE: Open Workspace in a new TAB

MENU.LABEL: - Menu

HEADER.TREE_MODAL.TOOLTIP: Reorder of Menu Items via Drag & Drop and Preview in configured languages
HEADER.REORDER.TOOLTIP: Reorder of Menu Items via Drag & Drop

ACTION.DISABLED: Green = Item is available in Menu - Changeable by click

I18N.LABEL: I18n
I18N.ROW.TOOLTIP: At least one translation is available

MENU.POSITION.TOOLTIP: Position path of the menu item in format [parent item.]item
MENU.URL.TOOLTIP: The URL to be called upon activation
MENU.MFE.TOOLTIP: Indicator whether the menu URL is offered by a registered Product
MENU.EXTERN.TOOLTIP: If checked then the Workspace is exit
MENU.MENU_JSON_DOWNLOAD: Download Menu Structure as JSON file
MENU.MENU_JSON_UPLOAD: Upload Menu Structure as JSON file
MENU.ERROR_FIND_MENU: Cannot find Menu Item with ID:

WORKSPACE_EXPORT.THEME_CHECKBOX_MESSAGE: Download the current Workspace definition as JSON file. You can also integrate the Theme definition.
WORKSPACE_EXPORT.THEME_NOT_SPECIFIED_MESSAGE: Theme cannot be exported because it was not specified in Workspace

PORTAL_IMPORT.PORTAL_IMPORT_OK: The Workspace definition has been checked and can be imported.
PORTAL_IMPORT.PORTAL_EXISTS_MESSAGE: A Workspace with this name already exists. Its definition is overwritten.
PORTAL_IMPORT.THEME_EXISTS_MESSAGE: A theme with this name already exists. Its definition is overwritten.
PORTAL_IMPORT.TENANT_EXISTS_MESSAGE: A Workspace with this name and Tenant Id already exists. Its definition is overwritten.
PORTAL_IMPORT.BASE_URL_EXISTS_MESSAGE: A Workspace with this Base URL already exists. Using it again will likely cause problems.
PORTAL_IMPORT.PORTAL_IMPORT_ERROR: An error occurred, the Workspace could not be created/updated.
PORTAL_IMPORT.INVALID_IMPORT_FILE: The Workspace import file is invalid
PORTAL_IMPORT.INVALID_MENU_ITEMS: One or more menu items are not valid
PORTAL_IMPORT.IMPORT_THEME_FAIL: An error occurred, the theme was not imported.
PORTAL_IMPORT.PORTAL_FORM_MISSING_FILES: Workspace or Theme files are missing.
PORTAL_IMPORT.VALIDATION_THEME_NAME_MISSING: No theme name found/found in theme definition
PORTAL_IMPORT.VALIDATION_MENU_ITEM_KEY_MISSING: The key is missing in a menu item
PORTAL_IMPORT.VALIDATION_MENU_ITEM_NAME_MISSING: The name is missing in a menu item
PORTAL_IMPORT.VALIDATION_MENU_ITEM_WRONG_POSITION: In a menu item, the value for 'position' is not a number
PORTAL_IMPORT.VALIDATION_MENU_ITEM_WRONG_DISABLED: In a menu item, the value for 'disabled' is not a boolean
PORTAL_IMPORT.VALIDATION_MENU_ITEM_WRONG_PORTALEXIT: In a menu item, the value for 'workspaceExit' is not a boolean

TOOLTIPS.NAME: Displayed name of the Product
TOOLTIPS.BASE_URL: URL used to access the Product from the Workspace.
TOOLTIPS.APP_ID: Unique ID of the Product for use in permission management. All modules of the Product must have the same Product ID.

ACTIONS.LABEL: Actions
ACTIONS.REGISTER.TOOLTIP: Make a Product available for this Workspace
ACTIONS.DEREGISTER.MESSAGE: Do you no longer want to use the Product "{{ITEM}}" in this Workspace?
ACTIONS.DEREGISTER.TOOLTIP: Do not use these Product in this Workspace anymore

PRODUCTS.AVAILABLE_PRODUCTS.TOOLTIP: List of available Products in Product Store
PRODUCTS.FORWARD: All menu URLs starting with this value will be forwarded to the corresponding Product  - e.g. the Product  Base URL
PRODUCTS.FORWARD_1: would catch both of the following URLs:

MESSAGES.DOES_NOT_EXIST: The assigned Product does not exist
MESSAGES.ALREADY_EXISTS: The path is already in use
MESSAGES.REGISTRATION_NOK: An error has occurred during Product registration
MESSAGES.DEREGISTRATION_NOK: An error has occurred during Product deregistration

IMAGE.UPLOAD_FAILED_SIZE: File upload failed. Please provide a workspace name
IMAGE.UPLOAD_FAILED_FILE: File upload failed. Image is too large

LOGO.UPLOAD_FAIL: The file was not uploaded successfully

TREE.PORTAL_CREATION_INFO: Do you wish to continue and update Workspace menu structure?
TREE.STRUCTURE_UPLOAD_ERROR: Error has occurred, menu structure wasn't overwritten
TREE.STRUCTURE_UPLOAD_INFO: Please, upload JSON file from your device. Keep in mind, that after upload whole menu structure will be overwritten.

ERRORS.PARSE_ERROR: Parse error: The contained structure does not match the expected format.
ERRORS.PATTERN_ERROR: The input does not match the required pattern
ERRORS.FILETYPE_PATTERN_ERROR: The file does not match the allowed filetypes: .png, .jpg, .jpeg

HTTP_STATUS_0.PORTALS: Unknown problem retrieving Workspace data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_0.MENUS: Unknown problem retrieving menu data - please try again.

HTTP_STATUS_403.PORTALS: You have no permissions to see workspaces.
HTTP_STATUS_403.MENUS: You have no permissions to see menus.

HTTP_STATUS_500.PORTALS: Unknown server problem retrieving Workspace data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_500.MENUS: Unknown server problem retrieving menu data - please try again.
